title: Beneath the Surface: Training Tomorrow's Water Stewards | 9/18/2025 | Event Calendar | The Ticker
text:
Beneath the Surface: Training Tomorrow’s Water Stewards
Thursday, September 18
11AM
Dennos Museum Center, NMC, TC
Art
$0-$10
The Great Lakes Water Studies Institute at NMC is advancing freshwater, groundwater, & marine science through cutting-edge technology, education, & research. This exhibit highlights NMC students' hands-on work with remotely operated vehicles, sonar mapping, & groundwater sampling. Runs Sept. 18 - Jan. 4. See web site for hours.
https://www.dennosmuseum.org/art/now-on-view/
